roleDescriptions.supervisorDesc: Can manage day-to-day operations, track deliveries, and oversee construction activities.
roleDescriptions.accountantDesc: Can manage payments, accounts, and financial aspects of the construction project.
roleDescriptions.ownerFull: Full administrative access to the site. Can manage users, settings, and all site operations.
roleDescriptions.supervisorFull: Can manage day-to-day operations, track deliveries, and oversee construction activities.
roleDescriptions.accountantFull: Can manage payments, accounts, and financial aspects of the construction project.

fileUpload.useCamera: Use camera to capture images directly

onboarding.skipAll: Don't show tours on other pages

welcome.title: Welcome to Site-Wise
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with managing your construction site efficiently.

siteSelector.title: Site Selection
siteSelector.description: Switch between different construction sites you manage from this dropdown.

quickStats.title: Quick Statistics
quickStats.description: Get an overview of your site's key metrics including deliveries, payments, and inventory.

recentActivities.title: Recent Activities
recentActivities.description: See the latest deliveries, payments, and other activities at your site.

shortcuts.title: Quick Navigation
shortcuts.description:
Pro tip: Use keyboard shortcuts for faster navigation:
• Shift+Alt+D for Dashboard
• Shift+Alt+I for Items
• Shift+Alt+V for Deliveries
• Shift+Alt+P for Payments
shortcuts.mobileDescription: Pro tip: Use the navigation menu to quickly switch between different sections of the app. All your main features are accessible from the sidebar.

addButton.title: Add New Items
addButton.description: Click here to add new construction materials and items to your inventory. You can also use Shift+Alt+N as a shortcut.

search.title: Search Items
search.description: Quickly find items by name, category, or tags. The search updates in real-time as you type.

table.title: Items List
table.description: View all your items here. Click on any item to see details or edit. The table is mobile-responsive.
table.descriptionWithClone: View all your items here. Click on any item to see details. Each item has action buttons - use the Clone button (copy icon) to quickly duplicate items with all their details. On mobile, access these actions through the three-dot menu.

cloneButton.title: Clone Items Quickly
cloneButton.description: Use the clone button to quickly create similar items. It copies all details from an existing item and adds '(Copy)' to the name, saving you time when adding variations of the same material.
cloneButton.mobileDescription: Tap the three-dot menu on any item card to access actions like Edit, Clone, and Delete. The Clone option lets you quickly create similar items by copying all details from an existing item.

recordButton.title: Record Delivery
recordButton.description: Click here to record new deliveries from vendors. Track what materials arrived and when.

search.title: Search Deliveries
search.description: Quickly find deliveries by vendor name, reference number, or notes. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Deliveries List
list.description: View all your deliveries here. Each delivery shows vendor, items, total amount, and payment status. Use the action buttons to view delivery details, edit information, or delete deliveries (if you have permission). Click on any delivery row to see full details.

filters.title: Filter Deliveries
filters.description: Filter deliveries by date range, vendor, or payment status to find what you need quickly.

addButton.title: Add New Vendors
addButton.description: Click here to add new vendors and suppliers. You can also use Shift+Alt+V as a shortcut.
addButton.mobileDescription: Tap here to add new vendors and suppliers to your project.

search.title: Search Vendors
search.description: Quickly find vendors by name, contact, or specialties. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Vendors List
list.description: View all your vendors here. Click on any vendor to see details, payment history, and outstanding amounts. You can edit, delete, or record payments directly from the action buttons.

addButton.title: Add New Services
addButton.description: Click here to add new services like labor, equipment, or professional services. You can also use Shift+Alt+S as a shortcut.
addButton.mobileDescription: Tap here to add new services like labor, equipment, or professional services.

search.title: Search Services
search.description: Quickly find services by name, category, or description. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Services List
list.description: View all your services here. You can see service details, rates, and booking history. Use the action buttons to edit, activate/deactivate, or delete services.

addButton.title: Add New Accounts
addButton.description: Click here to add new payment accounts like bank accounts, cash, or digital wallets. You can also use Shift+Alt+A as a shortcut.
addButton.mobileDescription: Tap here to add new payment accounts like bank accounts, cash, or digital wallets.

search.title: Search Accounts
search.description: Quickly find accounts by name or account number. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Accounts List
list.description: View all your payment accounts here. Monitor account balances, track transactions, and manage your financial accounts. Click on any account to see detailed transaction history.

recordButton.title: Record New Payments
recordButton.description: Click here to record payments made to vendors or for services. You can also use Shift+Alt+P as a shortcut.
recordButton.mobileDescription: Tap here to record payments made to vendors or for services.

search.title: Search Payments
search.description: Quickly find payments by vendor, account, or reference. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Payments List
list.description: View all your payments here. Track payment status, allocated amounts, and outstanding balances. You can edit payment details or delete payments if needed.

bookButton.title: Book New Services
bookButton.description: Click here to book services from your vendors. Schedule labor, equipment, or professional services. You can also use Shift+Alt+B as a shortcut.
bookButton.mobileDescription: Tap here to book services from your vendors. Schedule labor, equipment, or professional services.

search.title: Search Bookings
search.description: Quickly find service bookings by service name, vendor, or booking status. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Service Bookings List
list.description: View all your service bookings here. Track booking progress, payment status, and completion photos. You can edit booking details, update progress, or manage payments.

addButton.title: Add New Quotations
addButton.description: Click here to add price quotations from vendors for items or services. You can also use Shift+Alt+Q as a shortcut.
addButton.mobileDescription: Tap here to add price quotations from vendors for items or services.

search.title: Search Quotations
search.description: Quickly find quotations by item, vendor, or service. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Quotations List
list.description: View all your quotations here. Compare prices from different vendors, check validity dates, and manage your price quotes. You can edit or delete quotations as needed.

addButton.title: Add New Vendor Returns
addButton.description: Click here to record returns of materials to vendors. Track what was returned and when. You can also use Shift+Alt+R as a shortcut.
addButton.mobileDescription: Tap here to record returns of materials to vendors. Track what was returned and when.

search.title: Search Returns
search.description: Quickly find vendor returns by vendor name, reference number, or notes. The search updates in real-time as you type.

list.title: Vendor Returns List
list.description: View all your vendor returns here. Track what materials were returned, to which vendor, and the return status. You can edit return details or delete returns if needed.

pwa.installMessage: Add SiteWise to your home screen for quick access and better performance
pwa.updateMessage: A new version of SiteWise is available
pwa.updateDescription: A new version of the app is ready to install

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Analyze costs and expenses by tags, dates, and amounts
analytics.enterSettingName: Enter a name for this filter setting

messages.noFiltersApplied: Apply filters and click Calculate to see analytics

analytics.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this saved setting?

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.subtitle: Track all changes made to your site data
auditLogs.noLogsDescription: No changes have been recorded yet. Audit logs will appear here when data is created, updated, or deleted.
